item.description:
Cheri Perry co-owner of Kayak Ways LLC and a Yoga teacher for 5 years, (www.kayakways.net) will be offering this two hour workshop linking yoga poses to paddling and rolling a kayak. Assisting Cheri in this workshop is a special friend, Leslie Fiore (E-RYT 500) she is the founder of Port Yoga (www.portyoga.com). She has studied yoga for over 10 years and taught for over 7 years. Join us and learn how to lengthen your spine, strengthen your core, stretch out your hamstrings, get better balance, find additional rotation, and more. All poses will be accompanied by a discussion about how these will benefit your paddling and rolling skills. There will be a additional focus on kayak rolling, and specific land drills to help you improve your roll! This session is open to folks new to yoga as well as experienced yogi's and yoginis!

You can mail a check to: or I can send you a Paypal bill

Kayak Ways LLC

PO Box 122

Brownfield, ME 04010
item.how_to_find_us: Our Location We are conveniently located in Kennebunk "Lower Village", in the same group of shops as Chase Hill Bakery. For your convenience, we have free parking for our students.
item.name: Yoga for Rolling & Paddling
